name: Keyboard Warrior (itch) (Joshhyyy)
description:
Keyboard Warrior is a PC riff off of the classic title Guitar Hero.

It requires keys 1-9 and once you start there is no stopping. (No Numberpad)

The song lasts for around 5 minutes so have fun!

This prototype was developed in 48 hours

Programming:

Ben Chittenden

Josh Couchman 

Art:

Ben Chittenden
